tool_description: PGP Decryption API to easily decrypt an PGP encrypted file once the Private Key is provided along with the Passphrase.
name: PGP Decryption API
title: PGP Decryption API

api_list.name: PGP Decryption
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://pgp-decryption-api.p.rapidapi.com/pgpdecryptAPI.php"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "pgp-decryption-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://pgp-decryption-api.p.rapidapi.com/pgpdecryptAPI.php"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "pgp-decryption-api.p.rapidapi.com"

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
